data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Hamgyŏng-bukto to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hamgyŏng-bukto, North Korea
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Hamgyŏng-bukto, North Korea.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 63 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Hamgyŏng-bukto.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Hamgyŏng-bukto with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Deaf people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,288,828, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Hamgyŏng-bukto, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hamgyŏng-bukto, North Korea has a population of 2,327,400.

We estimate Hamgyŏng-bukto has 36,528 people who might know Jesus, 2,044 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,288,828 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 63 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Hamgyŏng-bukto, North Korea to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
